org.eso.ias.converter.config

Class IasioConfigurationDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eso.ias.converter.config.ConfigurationDaoBase
      • org.eso.ias.converter.config.IasioConfigurationDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IasioConfigurationDAO

    public class IasioConfigurationDaoImpl
extends ConfigurationDaoBase
    This DAO keeps in memory the configuration of the IASIOs defined in the CDB. The only strategy to save memory is to keep only the snapshot of configuration strictly needed to reduce the memory usage. This means to save a minimum data set of all the IASIOs defined in the CDB and not a reduced set of IASIOs than those defined in the CDB.

    Ideally all the configuration is red at startup and kept in a map to used as a cache, avoiding to read the configuration from the CDB at run time.
    This implementation could trigger a OOM if the configuration database contains too many IOASIOs and in that case we will have to adopt different strategies like for example

    • partition the data to be converted by more converters that also means to use more the one queue for the raw data produced by the plugins
    • access the CDB many times during the life cycle of the converter
    • ...
    Author:
    acaproni
